controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include requirements for registered co-operative customers?
Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to verify that a registered co-operative exists and has provided names of its chairman, secretary or equivalent officer?
controls.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems and controls you use to verify co-operative existence and officer details.

controls.label: Does your program include a procedure to collect the full name, registered office address, unique identifying number, and names of key officers (chairman, secretary, treasurer or equivalents) for registered co-operatives?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for collecting minimum KYC information about registered co-operatives.

controls.label: Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to determine whether additional KYC information beyond the minimum required should be collected for registered co-operatives?
controls.detail-label: Describe the risk-based factors or criteria you apply when deciding whether to collect additional KYC information.

controls.label: Does your program include a procedure to verify the full name and unique identifying number of the registered co-operative from reliable sources (ASIC, State/Territory registration body, co-operative registers, certified extracts, reliable documents or electronic data)?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for verifying co-operative name and registration number from reliable sources.

controls.label: Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to determine whether additional KYC information beyond co-operative name and registration number should be verified?
controls.detail-label: Describe the risk-based factors or criteria you apply when deciding whether to verify additional KYC information.

controls.label: Does your program require verification of co-operative information to be based on co-operative registers, certified extracts, meeting minutes, State/Territory registration body information, reliable independent documents, reliable electronic data, or a combination thereof?
controls.detail-label: Describe which verification methods your program requires for co-operative information.

controls.label: Does your program permit the use of disclosure certificates to verify co-operative information when information is not otherwise reasonably available from other reliable sources?
controls.detail-label: Describe the conditions and circumstances under which your program accepts disclosure certificates as verification.

controls.label: Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to respond to discrepancies in co-operative verification information?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedures for handling discrepancies to determine whether you can be reasonably satisfied about co-operative existence and officer details.

groups.title: Customer Due Diligence — Co-operatives
groups.description: AML/CTF program requirements for registered co-operative customers, including risk-based systems, KYC information collection and verification procedures.

groups.title: General CDD Obligation
groups.description: Applicability scope — determine whether CDD requirements apply to your customer base.

groups.title: Collection of KYC Information
groups.description: Minimum KYC information to collect about registered co-operatives and risk-based assessment for additional information.

groups.title: Verification of Information
groups.description: Procedures and methods to verify co-operative identity and officer details from reliable sources.

groups.title: Handling Discrepancies
groups.description: Risk-based systems to address discrepancies discovered during verification.
